item.title: Met Office at RenewableUK Conference
item.description: Met Office experts will be at the RenewableUK 2011 Annual Conference and Exhibition in Manchester this week to demonstrate how world leading science can help the wind energy market.
item.dc:title: Met Office at RenewableUK Conference
item.dc:creator: Met Office, FitzRoy Road, Exeter, Devon, EX1 3PB, United Kingdom

item.title: Preparing for weather this winter
item.description: This week sees the UK and devolved Governments launch their 'Get Ready for Winter' campaigns and websites.
item.dc:title: Preparing for weather this winter
item.dc:creator: Met Office, FitzRoy Road, Exeter, Devon, EX1 3PB, United Kingdom
item.dc:description: This week sees the UK and devolved governments launch their 'Get Ready for winter' campaigns and websites.

item.title: International stage for Met Office scientists
item.description: Met Office science will play a central role at an international event attracting hundreds of climate scientists from all over the world.
item.dc:title: International stage for Met Office scientists
item.dc:creator: Met Office, FitzRoy Road, Exeter, Devon, EX1 3PB, United Kingdom
item.dc:description: Met Office science will play a central role at the Open Science Conference of the World Climate Research Programme.
item.dc:publisher: Met Office, FitzRoy Road, Exeter, Devon, EX1 3PB, United Kingdom
item.dc:contributor: Met Office, FitzRoy Road, Exeter, Devon, EX1 3PB, United Kingdom

item.title: Met Office Hadley Centre appoints new head
item.description: The Met Office is delighted to announce the appointment of Professor Stephen Belcher as Head of the Met Office Hadley Centre.
item.dc:title: Met Office Hadley Centre appoints new head
item.dc:creator: Met Office, FitzRoy Road, Exeter, Devon, EX1 3PB, United Kingdom
item.dc:description: Professor Stephen Belcher has been announced as the new Head of the Met Office Hadley Centre.
item.dc:publisher: Met Office, FitzRoy Road, Exeter, Devon, EX1 3PB, United Kingdom
item.dc:contributor: Met Office, FitzRoy Road, Exeter, Devon, EX1 3PB, United Kingdom
